name: Notion Projects + Sub Tasks (Notion Template)
description: Do you wish Notion had a sub-tasks feature? So do I! That's why I created the Notion Projects + Sub Tasks template! This template will give you access to a simple and easy-to-use Notion system that allows you to quickly and easily create main and sub-tasks in Notion.What You'll GetA Simple Solution to Notion sub-tasksIntegrated Progress BarsLifetime access to future updates on this template
features: A Simple Solution to Notion sub-tasks; Integrated Progress Bars; Lifetime access to future updates on this template
